thread.title_full: NOPE: Flesh Eating Bacteria Consumes Man's Face | Health | News | Qatar Day

author: unilad
title: NOPE: Flesh Eating Bacteria Consumes Man's Face | Health
text:
One man from Vietnam has contracted a flesh eating bacteria that has consumed part of his face.
While the images are pretty gross, it’s actually quite serious, as the guy is currently fighting for his life.
The unnamed man has already lost his ears and part of his cheeks to the bacteria, with a disk shaped wound clearly visible.
It really is disgusting, and the man is thought to be getting medical help – but as of yet, the doctors don’t actually know what he’s suffering from, or if there is a cure.
